description:
The story centers around Yuuto Ayase and his classmate Haruka Nogizaka. While Yuuto is rather ordinary, Haruka is very attractive, intelligent and rich. Due to this, she is the school's most unattainable girl and is so idolized that her classmates give her the French nicknames "Nuit Étoile" (The Silver Star of the Night) and "Lumière du Clavier" (The Shining Princess on the Piano). One day, when Yuuto goes to the school library to return a book, he stumbles across Haruka and her darkest secret—she is a diehard fan of anime, manga and the otaku culture. Yuuto promises to keep her secret hidden and the two become close friends. Yuuto does his best to help Haruka with her secret hobby while developing his relationship with her.

(Source: Wikipedia)
synonyms: ความลับในใจของคุณหนูไอดอล

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

[Website](https://kaorijinal.com) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/shimizu-kaori) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ShimizuKaori)

A voice actress, narrator, actress and former child actor. She debuted her voice acting carrier in 1998, voicing the character [Iwakura Lain](https://anilist.co/character/2219/Iwakura-Lain) from [serial experiments lain](https://anilist.co/anime/339/serial-experiments-lain/).
She used to belong to Three Tree agency but is now a freelancer.

**Height:**163cm

[Profile (Ken Production)](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/member.php?mem=w42) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/nabatamehitomi/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_nabacan_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/naba3po/)

She was part of the seiyuu unit with [Shizuka Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/95093/) called "Hitomi Nabatame to Shizuka Itou" (生天目仁美と伊藤静) under Geneon's cosmic★motion label. Together they are known by the name Hitoshizuku (ひとしずく).

[Ken Production profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/member.php?mem=w66)

A female Japanese seiyū primarily for visual novels & some erotic games/anime.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/imozuka) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E9%87%8E%E8%81%A1)

Satoshi Ishino is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor, character/mechanical designer and animation director.

He started working at Studio Giants, but later went to work at Studio Fantasia before becoming a freelance animator. Today he is a part of the animator group Studio Hercules (スタジオへらくれす), and he's also a part of the doujin circle TEAM Imozuka (TEAM いもずか).

Satoshi is best known for his work as a character designer and animation supervisor in the show Excel Saga and the related Puni Puni Poemi.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/imozuka) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E9%87%8E%E8%81%A1)

Satoshi Ishino is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor, character/mechanical designer and animation director.

He started working at Studio Giants, but later went to work at Studio Fantasia before becoming a freelance animator. Today he is a part of the animator group Studio Hercules (スタジオへらくれす), and he's also a part of the doujin circle TEAM Imozuka (TEAM いもずか).

Satoshi is best known for his work as a character designer and animation supervisor in the show Excel Saga and the related Puni Puni Poemi.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/xexex36) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshihiro_watanabe1971/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/渡邊義弘_(アニメーター%29)

An animator, character designer and adult game artist.

_Not to be confused with the producer [of the same name.](https://anilist.co/staff/233840)_

title.native: 俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない
その着せ替え人形は恋をする
ご愁傷さま二ノ宮くん
お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件
かぐや様は告らせたい～天才たちの恋愛頭脳戦～
冴えない彼女の育てかた
中二病でも恋がしたい!
